create_dialog.title: Create New Version
create_dialog.info_message: First, define the version name and description. Then you can customize the region data.
create_dialog.description_placeholder: After 10 years of conflict, cities begin to rise again. The economy remains fragile, but hope returns to the devastated streets.

region.title: Delete Region

region.message_with_versions: This will permanently delete "{{entityName}}" and all {{totalVersions}} versions.
